ovdesc.p: This table contains the collector types. There are 4 types of collector:
1. Tele-collectors - Collecting the money through the telephone
2. Field collectors - Directly meet the clients and do the debt collection
3. Supervisors - The supervisors are assistants will do the debt collection with refer to their managers instructions.
4. External agencies - The external agencies will do the debt collection as per their agreed terms and conditions with the bank.

desc.p: Full description of the collector type.
Type of queues that this type of collectors can work on.
It should be an entry in the QUEUE TYPE table.
Whether this collector type is internal or external to the bank.
I for Internal, E for External.
Main action performed by this type of collectors.
The Value should be accepted from CL.ACTION
